add_library(wxWidgets_base SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_core SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_regex SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_jpeg SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_tiff SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_png SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_zlib SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_propgrid SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_adv SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_xml SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_libwxexpat SHARED IMPORTED)

set_target_properties(wxWidgets_base PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxbase32u.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_core PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxmsw32u_core_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxmsw32u_core.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_regex PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxregexu.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_jpeg PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxjpeg.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_tiff PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxtiff.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_png PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxpng.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_zlib PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxzlib.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_propgrid PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxmsw32u_propgrid_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxmsw32u_propgrid.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_adv PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxmsw32u_adv.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_xml PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_xml_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxbase32u_xml.a")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_libwxexpat PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/wxbase32u_gcc1220_x64.dll" IMPORTED_IMPLIB "C:/wxWidgets/gcc_lib/libwxexpat.a")
